data.meta_description: Yuko Kobayashi ( , Kobayashi Yko, born February 6, 1961 in Tokyo, Japan) is a Japanese voice actress, currently affiliated with 81 Produce and married to voice actor Mitsuaki Hoshino. Washu Hakubi in Tenchi Muyo Shigeru kido (Gary Oak) in Pocket Monsters Ayako Okamura in Please Save My Earth
data.text:
Sneha Girap

(Editor)

I Love to read n write about Things that I find Interesting

Yuko Kobayashi

Share on FacebookTweet on TwitterShare on LinkedInShare on Reddit

Sign in

Yuko kobayashi special interview

Yuko Kobayashi (小林 優子, Kobayashi Yūko, born February 6, 1961 in Tokyo, Japan) is a Japanese voice actress, currently affiliated with 81 Produce and married to voice actor Mitsuaki Hoshino.
